titleStmt.title: The rates of marchandizes as they are set downe in the Booke of rates for the custome and subsidie of poundage, and for the custome and subsidie of cloathes, the same being appointed by his Maiestie, and confirmed by the Lorde deputye and Councell, and ordered to be published in print, for the direction of such as it may concerne in this kingdome of Ireland.
Book of rates.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Franckton, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: A1 blank except for signature and decorative woodcut panel.
Reproduction of the original in the University College (University of Oxford). Library.
